name: Vugluskr: Zombie Rampage DEMO
description:
***DEMO - ONLY FIRST LEVEL ***

Third-person single-player zombie shooter. Just pure zombie shooting.

• Enjoy unreal next gen-graphic: 2K textures, lights & shadows, visual and sound effects. 

• Fight against zombies, spider mutants & evil soldiers. 

• Use different automatic rifles or frag grenades to defeat enemies.

 • 9 huge fantastic medieval levels (in FULL VERSION) day and night time. 

• Collect crystals to activate ZIP lines.

 • Travel at ZIP lines to hidden level areas.

 • Open treasure chests to collect keys.

 • Find and open an exit from the level. 

• Interact with other SWAT members. 

• Read diaries and reveal the root cause of infection. 

• Have fun.

Good old classic style shooter is waiting for you.

** In DEMO - 1 level of thunderbolt zombie rampage action. ***
